title: Dying with low hp with nothing damaging on me
body: soo uhh is it a new rune or something because theres been about 6 times since the new patch that i've had about 60-80 hp with no ignite no minions no champions damaging me and im dying? can anyone help me out?

replies.body: new rune scorch, udyr tiger burn, darius/talon bleed, mordekaiser ult, brand passive, probably scorch.
If you are getting killed by talon, his passive makes you bleed for a few seconds.
There's scorch which is basically like the old deathfire touch
